text: Raúl Ernesto Ruiz Pino (25 July 1941 – 19 August 2011) was an experimental Chilean movie maker, writer and teacher. His work is best known in France. He directed over 100 films. == References == ==Other websites== * *Time magazine obituary (2011) by Richard Corliss Category:1941 births Category:2011 deaths Category:People from Puerto Montt Category:Chilean movie directors Category:Chilean screenwriters
title: Raúl Ruiz (director)
